message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see a section labeled "Cash and Cash Equivalents" which contains three line items:
- Beginning Balance: 8000000.00
- Ending Balance: 838919.82
- Net Increase: -7161080.18

The "Beginning Balance" represents the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period, which is 8000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'} }
```
